Class Payslip

java.lang.Object
com.mycompany.payrollsystem.system.Payslip
public class Payslip extends Object
Represents a payslip for an employee containing details such as gross pay, tax, net pay, and the pay period.

  • Constructor Details

    • Payslip

      public Payslip(String name, int id, double grossPay, double tax, double netPay, String payPeriod)
      Constructor for payslips Takes the below parameters and creates a payslip obhject
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the employee
      id - The unique ID of the employee
      grossPay - the gross pay of the employee for the pay period
      tax - The amount of tax deducted from the gross pay
      netPay - The net pay of the employee after tax
      payPeriod - The pay period for which the payslip is generated
